text: Angelo Raffaele Dinardo (7 January 1932 – 26 February 2015) was an Italian politician. He served as the President of the Italian region of Basilicata from 1995 to 2000, as a member of the now defunct Italian People's Party (PPI). Dinardo died in Potenza on 26 February 2015, at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Presidents of Basilicata Category:People from Irsina
title: Angelo Raffaele Dinardo
